document_data.name: Smite
document_data.mainbody: '''''Smite''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[shugenja]] in [[Kara-Tur]]. The spell was very rare outside Kara-Tur.
document_data.Effects: This powerful spell was used by a shugenja to bring forth the wrath of their [[deity]]. During casting, the shugenja pointed their holy symbol at the target creature. The creature was then wracked with terrible pain throughout its body. Additionally, the creature was inflicted with blindness and disease, the effects identical to the ''[[cause blindness]]'' and ''[[cause disease]]'' spells.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], the shugenja's holy symbol.
